verses.verse: <S%H480>Misery<s%> is <S%H625>mine!<s%> Indeed, I am like one who gathers the summer <S%H7019>fruits,<s%> as <S%H5955>gleanings<s%> of the <S%H1210>vineyard:<s%> There is no <S%H811>cluster<s%> of grapes to <S%H398>eat.<s%> My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>desires<s%> to eat the early <S%H1063>fig.<s%>

The <S%H2623>godly<s%> man has <S%H6>perished<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and there is no one <S%H3477>upright<s%> among <S%H120>men.<s%> They all lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H1818>blood;<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6679>hunts<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> with a <S%H2764>net.<s%>

Their <S%H3709>hands<s%> are on that which is <S%H7451>evil<s%> to do it <S%H3190>diligently.<s%> The <S%H8269>ruler<s%> and <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> for a <S%H7966>bribe;<s%> and the <S%H1419>powerful<s%> man <S%H1696>dictates<s%> the <S%H1942>evil<s%> <S%H5315>desire<s%> of his <S%H5686>soul.<s%> Thus they conspire together.

The <S%H2896>best<s%> of them is like a <S%H2312>brier.<s%> The most <S%H3477>upright<s%> is worse than a thorn <S%H4534>hedge.<s%> The <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H6822>watchmen,<s%> even your <S%H6486>visitation,<s%> has <S%H935>come;<s%> now is the time of their <S%H3998>confusion.<s%>

<S%H539>Don't<s%> trust in a <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%> <S%H982>Don't<s%> put confidence in a <S%H7453>friend.<s%> With the woman <S%H7901>lying<s%> in your <S%H2436>embrace,<s%> be <S%H8104>careful<s%> of the <S%H6607>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth!<s%>

For the <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5034>dishonors<s%> the <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> rises <S%H6965>up<s%> against her <S%H517>mother,<s%> the <S%H2545>daughter-in<s%>-law against her <S%H3618>mother-in<s%>-law; a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H341>enemies<s%> are the <S%H582>men<s%> of his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>
But as for <S%H6822>me,<s%> I will look to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> I will <S%H3176>wait<s%> for the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation.<s%> My <S%H430>God<s%> will hear <S%H8085>me.<s%>

<S%H8055>Don't<s%> rejoice against <S%H341>me,<s%> my enemy. When I <S%H5307>fall,<s%> I will <S%H6965>arise.<s%> When I <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be a light to <S%H216>me.<s%>

I will <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2197>indignation<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> because I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H7378>him,<s%> until he pleads my <S%H7379>case,<s%> and <S%H6213>executes<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> for <S%H3318>me.<s%> He will bring me forth to the <S%H216>light.<s%> I will <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

Then my <S%H341>enemy<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H955>it,<s%> and shame will <S%H3680>cover<s%> her who <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>me,<s%> where is Yahweh your <S%H430>God?<s%> Then my enemy will <S%H7200>see<s%> me and will <S%H5869>cover<s%> her <S%H4823>shame.<s%> Now she will be trodden down like the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>
A <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> your <S%H1447>walls<s%>â€” In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> he will <S%H2706>extend<s%> your <S%H7368>boundary.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> they will <S%H935>come<s%> to you from <S%H804>Assyria<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4693>Egypt,<s%> and from <S%H4693>Egypt<s%> even to the <S%H5104>River,<s%> and from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>
Yet the <S%H776>land<s%> will be <S%H8077>desolate<s%> because of those who <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H6529>it,<s%> for the fruit of their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

<S%H7462>Shepherd<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> with your <S%H7626>staff,<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of your <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> who <S%H7931>live<s%> by <S%H910>themselves<s%> in a <S%H3293>forest,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of fertile <S%H3760>pasture<s%> <S%H7462>land,<s%> let them feed; in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old.<s%>
"As in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H3318>coming<s%> forth out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> I will <S%H7200>show<s%> them marvelous <S%H6381>things.<s%>"

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> and be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of all their <S%H1369>might.<s%> They will <S%H7760>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%> on their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> Their <S%H241>ears<s%> will be <S%H2790>deaf.<s%>

They will <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent.<s%> Like crawling <S%H2119>things<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> they shall come <S%H7264>trembling<s%> out of their <S%H4526>dens.<s%> They will come with <S%H3372>fear<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and will be afraid because of <S%H3372>you.<s%>

Who is a <S%H410>God<s%> like <S%H5375>you,<s%> who pardons <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and passes <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H6588>disobedience<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of his <S%H5159>heritage?<s%> He <S%H2388>doesn't<s%> retain his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H5703>forever,<s%> because he <S%H2654>delights<s%> in loving <S%H2617>kindness.<s%>

He will <S%H7725>again<s%> have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H3533>us.<s%> He will tread our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> under <S%H7993>foot;<s%> and you will cast all their <S%H2403>sins<s%> into the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

You will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> as you have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old.<s%>
